comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: The Yankees' site places Hilltop Park at 168th Street and Broadway (now the site of Columbia-Presbyterian Medical Center): newyork.yankees.mlb.com/nyy/history/ballparks.jsp Guy Zinn played for the team from 1911 to 1912.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for your information about the location.  We'll add it to the source data and reload the description.
